from rest_framework import serializers
from .models.inventory import Inventory
from .models.user import User
from .models.order import Order
from .models.order_menu import OrderMenu
from .models.menu_inventory import MenuInventory
from .models.menu import Menu

[docs]class MenuSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    class Meta:
        model = Menu
        fields = "__all__"



[docs]class InventorySerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    class Meta:
        model = Inventory
        fields = "__all__"



[docs]class UserSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    class Meta:
        model = User
        fields = "__all__"



[docs]class OrderSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    status = serializers.IntegerField()
    class Meta:
        model = Order
        fields = "__all__"

    

[docs]class OrderMenuSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    class Meta:
        model = OrderMenu
        fields = "__all__"



[docs]class MenuInventorySerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    class Meta:
        model = MenuInventory
        fields = "__all__"



[docs]class WeatherSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    temperature = serializers.FloatField()
    icon = serializers.CharField()
    condition = serializers.CharField()
    surge = serializers.DictField()



[docs]class InventoryCountSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    name = serializers.CharField()
    count = serializers.IntegerField()



[docs]class SalesReportSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    element1 = serializers.CharField()
    element2 = serializers.IntegerField()
    element3 = serializers.DecimalField(max_digits=10, decimal_places=2)



[docs]class ExcessReportSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    element1 = serializers.CharField()
    element2 = serializers.IntegerField()
    element3 = serializers.IntegerField()



[docs]class RestockReportSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    element1 = serializers.CharField()
    element2 = serializers.IntegerField()
    element3 = serializers.IntegerField()



[docs]class SellsTogetherSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    element1 = serializers.CharField()
    element2 = serializers.CharField()
    element3 = serializers.IntegerField()
